Welcome to the 19th National SHP Conference, running from Friday 6 July to Sunday 8 July 2007 at Leeds Trinity &
Our workshop leaders will include some of the best-known names in history education, working alongside practising teachers who wrestle with just the same problems as you.
A year's INSET in three days:
• Quality workshops covering the whole 11-19 History curriculum,
Up-to-date information on issues of the moment,

column2: The Schools History Project is dedicated to the cause of good history teaching. The Conference will provide lots of ideas for immediate use as well as important information about imminent curriculum change.&nbsp
column3: It is tremendous value for money in comparison with commercial INSET.&quot

column1: Our previous conferences have attracted over 200 History teachers from the UK and all around the world
column2: including Russia, Canada, Romania, Estonia and Norway.
